member.name: T:Syncfusion.Themes.Office2019Colorful.WPF.Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings
member.summary: Represents a class that holds the respective theme color and common key values for customization

member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of header related areas of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.Office2019Colorful.WPF.Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings.BodyFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of content area of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.Office2019Colorful.WPF.Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings.BodyAltFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternate font size of content area of control in selected theme

example.code: Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings office2019ColorfulThemeSettings = new Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings(); office2019ColorfulThemeSettings.Body AltFontSize = 10;

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.Office2019Colorful.WPF.Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the font family of text in control for selected theme

example.code: Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings office2019ColorfulThemeSettings = new Office2019ColorfulThemeSettings(); office2019ColorfulThemeSettings.FontFamily = new FontFamily("Callibri");
